name: Evil Robot Traffic Jam HD
description: Evil Robot Traffic Jam is a tower defense game built from the ground up for virtual reality. Play as an agent of the Evil Robot Defense Force: place powerful defense towers, activate destructive special abilities, and disrupt the robots with hacker drones!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5-4430 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: Vive VR headset required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i7-4820K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 980
